title: Analyze Grind Size Distribution
description: A plant metallurgist analyzes the particle size distribution of the output from the grinding circuit to ensure it is optimal for flotation.

tasks.description: Take a sample of the slurry from the cyclone overflow.
tasks.expected_outcome: A representative sample is collected for analysis.

tasks.description: Analyze the sample using a laser particle size analyzer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyzer generates a particle size distribution curve.

tasks.description: Review the results, checking the P80 (the size that 80% of the particles are smaller than). If it's too coarse, adjust the cyclone settings to fix it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The P80 is found to be too coarse. The cyclone's vortex finder is adjusted to make the grind finer.
